#### Start by configuring TEAM Mentor 4.0. 

The simple configuration file is located in
```\TM40\TM_4_0_Design\src\misc```

- Open the ```Config.coffee``` file
Here you only need to edit the line that says ```@tm_35_Server ``` 
- Change the URL to the TM36 URL you configured in the settup of TM36 Backend section. 

![](/Image/install04.png)


#### Set up components as services

- Open Command Prompt as Administrator and navigate to the ```TM40\TM_4_0_GraphDB``` directory
- Run ```npm run-script installWinSvc``` (note the capitlization it is case sensitive)
- Then navigate to ```TM40\TM_4_0_Design``` directory
- Run ```npm run-script installWinSvc``` (note the capitlization it is case sensitive)
- Open the Services snap in. You will see two new services:

![](/Image/install05.png)

#### Set up User for the newly created services.

- Open the Computer Manager snap-in, and create a new user _TM40_

![](/Image/install06.png)

Make sure you create a strong password. You will need this password in the next step only.

- Go back to the Services snap-in and select TM_4_0_GraphDB Service properties. 
- Open the “Log On” Tab.
- Change the Log on as to use the newly created TM40 account. 

![](/Image/install06-1.png)

- Repeat the same step for the TM_4_0_Design Service.

#### Set up permissions. 

Go to the TM40 directory and give the newly created _TM40_ user full control over the directory.

![](/Image/install07.png)

Continue by going through [Installing Reverse Proxy](33cebe6d-c4ac-4ac8-b047-f8f07f5df2e9)
